cisformer.atac2rna_surround_attention_generate.exists(val)
cisformer.atac2rna_surround_attention_generate.grange_intersect(a, b)
cisformer.atac2rna_surround_attention_generate.granges2bed(granges, output, no_info=False)

covert granges into bed format file :param granges: format like this: ['chr14:103715039-103715244', 'chr19:10518814-10518968'] :type granges: iterable object :param output: name of output file :type output: str

cisformer.atac2rna_surround_attention_generate.main(output_dir, data_path, celltype_info, model_parameters, num_of_cells, config, distance)
cisformer.atac2rna_surround_attention_generate.read_result(result_file)
cisformer.atac2rna_surround_attention_generate.split_grange(gene_coordinate)

split genome range string

Parameters:

gene_coordinate (str) -- genome range information like: "chr16:28931939-28939346"

Returns:

chr int: start_loc int: end_loc

Return type:

str

cisformer.data_preprocess module

cisformer.data_preprocess.main(rna, atac, manually, atac2rna, save_dir, config, batch_size, num_workers, cnt, shuffle, dec_whole_length)

_summary_ The shape and type of saved .pt files: Parent (list): rna_sequence, rna_value, atac_sequence, atac_value, enc_pad_mask Shape of child (tensor): rna_sequence: Cell number * multiple, sequence_len rna_value: Cell number * multiple, sequence_len atac_sequence: Cell number * multiple, sequence_len, digit(6) atac_value: Cell number * multiple, sequence_len enc_pad_mask: Cell number * multiple, sequence_len

cisformer.data_preprocess.pair_data_process(rna, atac, enc_max_len, dec_max_len, rna_num_bin, multiple, atac2rna, batch, num_workers, shuffle, cnt, save_dir, is_raw_count, file_name)

cisformer.generate_default_config module

cisformer.generate_default_config.main()

cisformer.map_rna_atac module

cisformer.map_rna_atac.is_ens(gene_iter)

Give a gene iterator, and return True if most of them are named by ENSEMBLE id

Parameters:

gene_iter (iter) -- Gene iterator. A list like object containing gene names

Returns:

bool

cisformer.map_rna_atac.main(rna_file, atac_file, save_dir=None, test_percent=0.2, seed=2023, divide=False, log1p=False)

map rna and atac and divide them into train and test set

Parameters:

  • rna_file (_type_) -- _description_

  • atac_file (_type_) -- _description_

  • save_dir (_type_, optional) -- _description_. Defaults to None. By default it will use the path of atac file.

  • test_percent (float, optional) -- _description_. Defaults to 0.2.

  • seed (int, optional) -- _description_. Defaults to 2023.

  • divide (bool, optional) -- Whether to split the dataset into train and test dataset. Defaults to True.

  • log1p (bool, optional) -- Whether to normalize rna dataset by log1p.
